ing.item: Soy breakfast links cut into pieces
something I like to have in the fall on those cool evenings. The

directions.step:
measurements are not exact and you can basically add ingredients according to taste. This version is vegeterian, but can be adapted for a meat eater.
In a casserole dish or large square baking pan, mix all ingredients except corn bread mix. Prepare corn bread mix according to package directions. Pour over the bean mixture. Bake at 350 degrees for 30 to 40 minutes.
This will serve 4 as a main dish with a salad. It will serve 8-10 as a side dish. Enjoy!
SAMADM@RITVAX.ISC.RIT.EDU
